page.title: 02 RINGMORE
page.content: Most of the land here is residental and the houses are interspread. There are steep inclines on either side of the valley with many trees. The owner of Hill Park Farm has 75 acres but he farms 150 acres, renting the others. Up the road a little way is a market garden owned by Roy. He has 35 acres and grows vegatables. His fields are small, steep and fertile. There is a second market garden of 56 acres. Products grown here include potatoes, tomatoes, mushrooms, lettuce, cabbages, onions, cucumbers and broad beans. The owner also keeps sheep and goats. There are many fields in the area, the average size of the fields is 4 to 5 acres. The fields are steep with many pylons across them.
